issue.title: *** New SubT Simulation docker image available on DockerHub ***

content.raw:
In my case still problem with display:  
`[Dbg] [Manager.cc:773] Loading plugin. Name[ignition::launch::GazeboGui] File[libignition-launch-gazebogui.so]`  
`QStandardPaths: XDG_RUNTIME_DIR not set, defaulting to '/tmp/runtime-developer'`  
`No protocol specified`  
`qt.qpa.screen: QXcbConnection: Could not connect to display :0`  
`Could not connect to any X display.`  
`roscore/master is not yet running, will wait for it to start`

when running on remote machine
